data.text: Guye loo ɠundiɠii nɔnɔi ʋe. Davide ná-guyei. É loozu kɔnigi ɠa, nii é zeɠezu Gate taazuʋɛ.
È lɛbiyai lɔa doungoiti daaʋɛ, ta ɲiimiɓɔlegiti,
Siɛgi zu nà geeɠɔlɔgiti pɛtɛna da, ti ga ɗɔnɔiti, è-yeei ti ɓɛtɛai,
Nuɓusɛi ɠa ga leeni, è ʋa ɠigaiziɛ su?
Anɛɛ naa ʋe, è kɛɛʋɛ ga GALA ná-seikobai nɔ,
È zobogi veeʋɛ bɛ, ga é masadai ɠɛ anii kpein unda, è-yeei ti ɓɛtɛai,
toganiiti pɛ, ma wolaiti ta ma goiti,
